00056 
00057                 // DSP LOOP - ARGUMENT IS A CONSTANT
00058                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00059                 {
00060                         tt_sample_value temp;
00061                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00062                         
00063                         while(temp_vs--){
00064                                 //*out++ = onewrap(*in++, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00065                                 temp = *in->vector++;
00066                                 if(temp >= 1.0)
00067                                         temp -= 1.0;
00068                                 else if(temp < 0.0)
00069                                         temp += 1.0;
00070                                 *out->vector++ = temp;
00071                         }
00072                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00073                 }
00074                 
00075 };
00076 
00077 #endif // TT_ONEWRAP_H
